summary: This mod adds a new land created with skyrim assets.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Description
[/b][/size]Krazak is an mod that adds a new land with a fortress and a cave that features enemies
wildlife and many more.
Through out the island there are animels beatifull landscape and of course enemies.
This mod offers no story line or quest to follow it is strictly a mod that offers a
challange with a reward.

[size=5][size=5][b]Location
[/b][/size][/size]The pathway to Krazak is located just outside of winterhold.

[size=5][b]On a presonal note
[/b][/size]If there are any bugs or other issues all you have to do is comment and I will do my best to fix it.
I worked many (many) hours on this, and i hope you enjoy it :)
if you played my previous mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91831?tab=description]Black Rain dungeon[/url] you can see that I don't add quasts to my mods 
I am more of a level designer I guess.
author: Skydoctor47
